statements: UPDATE music_school_attendance SET attendance_status = TRUE WHERE student_id = 101 AND class_id = 201 AND event_id = 301;

UPDATE music_school_attendance SET attendance_status = TRUE WHERE student_id = 101 AND event_id = 201 AND class_id = 301;
